title: Painting, ca. 1890
creditline: Gift of Mary N. Ettie and Elizabeth P. Weber in memory of George M. Nieder, United States Marine
description: Horizontal rectangle.  Courtroom scene with two prisoners on their knees before a judge, other prisoners are held at sides by guards.

tombstone.epitaph:
Painting, ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. Gouache on rice paper. Gift of Mary N. Ettie and Elizabeth P. Weber in memory of George M. Nieder, United States Marine. 1966-36-7.
